sourcesContent:

export function colorTheme({ color = {} } = baseDefaults) {
  const defaults = makeColorScheme({
    foreground: '#fff',
    background: 'hsl(0, 0%, 12%, 1)',
    transparent: '#00ffff00',

    foregroundInvert: 'hsl(0, 0%, 12%, 1)',
    backgroundInvert: '#fff',

    accent2: swatches['pink-400'],
    accent: swatches['pink-vivid-400'],
    active: swatches['pink-400'],
    danger2: swatches['red-vivid-400'],
    danger: swatches['red-400'],
    error2: swatches['red-vivid-400'],
    error: swatches['red-400'],
    muted2: swatches['grey-400'],
    muted: swatches['grey-500'],
    primary2: swatches['blue-vivid-400'],
    primary: swatches['blue-400'],
    secondary2: '#999',
    secondary: '#e5e5e5',
    success2: swatches['green-vivid-400'],
    success: swatches['green-400'],
    tertiary2: swatches['grey-400'],
    tertiary: swatches['grey-500'],
    warning2: swatches['yellow-vivid-400'],
    warning: swatches['yellow-400'],
  })

  return merge(color)(defaults)
}
